Where You'll Find Chili's in Los Angeles

From the beach to the mountains, there's a Los Angeles location for you. Stop by our Manhattan Beach or Torrance locations near the beach, or visit our restaurants in Inglewood or Whittier. If you're traveling through LAX, get your Chili's fix at our LAX Airport Kiosk location.

Menu Offerings You'll Love at Chili's

Stopping by for a quick lunch? Dig into one of our quick and easy lunch combos, like Fajitas, a Bacon Avocado Chicken Sandwich, or Classic Turkey Toasted Sandwich.

Going out with friends for a fun night on the town? Share a few appetizers, like the White Spinach Queso, Chipotle Chicken Flatbread, or Tableside Guacamole. Then choose from Chili's favorites like the Big Mouth Bites, Grilled Fish Tacos, or Margarita Fresh Mex Bowl.

Dining with little Chili's fans? Kids will love the Cheese Quesadilla, Grilled Chicken Platter, and Burger Bites.

Serving Los Angeles and local neighborhoods including:

Beverly Hills, Chinatown, Downtown LA, Hollywood, LAX, Little Tokyo, Long Beach, Melrose, Pasadena, Santa Monica, Silver Lake, Studio City, Universal City, Venice, West Hollywood, Westwood, Wilshire
